title: Editorial Board
description: Award–winning author Spring Meadows and newspaper–turned–literary editor Rachel Templeton have one thing in they can’t stand each other! Spring is sure that her bestselling talents single–handedly keep her publishing company afloat, while Rachel would like nothing better than to take this smart–mouthed, button–pushing prima donna down a peg or two. When Spring makes the fatal mistake of accusing Rachel of sexual misconduct, Rachel decides to teach her a lesson. ”What is an author to an editor?” Spring asks herself. If only she had been prepared for Rachel’s answer…
author: Anastasia Vitsky
